alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Marion (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:07PM CDT until August 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Marion County in northwestern Alabama... Northeastern Lamar County in west central Alabama... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamilton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Winfield, Haleyville, Guin, Brilliant, Glen Allen, Beaverton, Gu- Win, Brinn, Weston, Lake Buttahatchee, Twin, Tucker, Pearces Mill, Rankin Fite Airport, Texas, Marion County Public Lake, Piney Grove and Pikeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
